original_solution_mapping.L1: As she gave 1 balloon out, 12 balloons floated away plus she gave away 9 more balloons so she is down 1+12+9 = <<1+12+9=22>>22 balloons
original_solution_mapping.L2: She started with 50 and gave/lost 22 balloons so she has 50-22 = <<50-22=28>>28 balloons
original_solution_mapping.L3: She also took her coworkers last 11 balloons so her new total is 28+11 = <<28+11=39>>39 balloons

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7014.
    Returns: the number of balloons Claire has.
    """
    # L1
    given_one_balloon = 1 # 1 balloon to a little girl
    floated_away = 12 # 12 balloons floated away
    gave_away_more = 9 # gave 9 more away
    total_lost_balloons = given_one_balloon + floated_away + gave_away_more

    # L2
    started_balloons = 50 # started with 50 balloons
    remaining_after_loss = started_balloons - total_lost_balloons

    # L3
    coworker_balloons = 11 # last 11 from her coworker
    final_balloons = remaining_after_loss + coworker_balloons

    # FA
    answer = final_balloons
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: As she gave {given_one_balloon} balloon out, {floated_away} balloons floated away plus she gave away {gave_away_more} more balloons so she is down {given_one_balloon}+{floated_away}+{gave_away_more} = <<{given_one_balloon}+{floated_away}+{gave_away_more}={total_lost_balloons}>>{total_lost_balloons} balloons

She started with {started_balloons} and gave/lost {total_lost_balloons} balloons so she has {started_balloons}-{total_lost_balloons} = <<{started_balloons}-{total_lost_balloons}={remaining_after_loss}>>{remaining_after_loss} balloons

She also took her coworkers last {coworker_balloons} balloons so her new total is {remaining_after_loss}+{coworker_balloons} = <<{remaining_after_loss}+{coworker_balloons}={final_balloons}>>{final_balloons} balloons

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: As she gave 1 balloon out, 12 balloons floated away plus she gave away 9 more balloons so she is down 1+12+9 = <<1+12+9=22>>22 balloons
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: She started with 50 and gave/lost 22 balloons so she has 50-22 = <<50-22=72>>72 balloons
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: She also took her coworkers last 11 balloons so her new total is 72+11 = <<72+11=83>>83 balloons

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
